meanings.definition: A medicinal substance or antidote used to treat poisoning or venomous bites.
meanings.sent1: The doctor administered theriacs to the patient who had been bitten by a snake.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, theriacs were believed to have magical healing powers.
meanings.sent3: The village healer accidentally spilled the theriacs on his own foot, thinking it was a potion for good luck.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother's recipe for theriacs was like a secret elixir passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the theriacs filled the room, overpowering even the strongest odors.
